job.jobname: ! EG: Set BTW code to Orlaco GMBH for ICP

step.datasource: INSERT INTO [ExactData].dbo._ST_LOG_Invoice_VAT SELECT fh.faknr, 'DE293308756' as VATNumber_new, fh.VATNumber as VATNumber_old, GETDATE() as runtime FROM [400].dbo.frhkrg fh WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE fh.fakdebnr = '100044' AND fh.VATNumber != 'DE293308756' AND fh.syscreated > DATEADD(MONTH,-1,GETDATE())
UPDATE dbo.frhkrg WITH (ROWLOCK) SET VATNumber = 'DE293308756' WHERE fakdebnr = '100044' AND VATNumber != 'DE293308756' AND syscreated > DATEADD(MONTH,-1,GETDATE())
step.stepname: Set BTW code to Orlaco GmbH for ICP
